author: TravisEz13
body:
Sorted spelling dictionary for easy of management.

I'm enabling markdown validating, which is bringing a lot of words into the scope of spelling check.  Having the words sorted helps verify that a similar word doesn't already exist.

Having the words in a random order makes finding and updating words in the dictionary more tedious.

cc @PowerShell/area-documentation
title: Sorted spelling dictionary for easy of management
